name: investbrain
description: Investbrain is a self hosted investment tracking and analytics tool. It aggregates portfolio positions, prices and performance, then displays charts and summaries to help individual investors understand risk, returns, and diversification over time.
features: Portfolio Tracking: Monitor all your investments in stocks, bonds, and other assets.
Performance Analytics: Analyze returns, volatility, and risk metrics over time.
Asset Allocation: Visualize portfolio diversification across asset classes and sectors.
Historical Data: Track portfolio value and performance with historical charts.
Risk Analysis: Understand portfolio risk with volatility and correlation metrics.
Multi-Currency: Support for international investments with currency conversion.
Privacy-Focused: Keep all financial data on your own server.
Custom Reports: Generate detailed reports on portfolio performance and holdings.
